description: Search and retrieve Grokipedia articles with filters, full content, and citations. Explore related pages and extract sections to quickly gather relevant knowledge. Run guided workflows to research topics, find sources, and compare subjects.

host.description: Host for the server to bind to

port.description: Port to run the server on

capabilities.name: search
capabilities.description: Search for articles in Grokipedia with optional filtering and sorting.

capabilities.name: get_page
capabilities.description: Get complete page information including metadata, content preview, and citations summary.

capabilities.name: get_page_content
capabilities.description: Get only the article content without citations or metadata.

capabilities.name: get_page_citations
capabilities.description: Get the citations list for a specific page.

capabilities.name: get_related_pages
capabilities.description: Get pages that are linked from the specified page.

capabilities.name: get_page_section
capabilities.description: Extract a specific section from an article by header name.

capabilities.name: get_page_sections
capabilities.description: Get a list of all section headers in an article.
